Properties

chunkSize

Number

Defined in src/davinci-eight/geometries/DrawAttribute.ts:41

The chunking chunkSize of the attribute. The chunking chunkSize is invariant given the values and is used to describe the vertex attribute pointer.

values

Number

Defined in src/davinci-eight/geometries/DrawAttribute.ts:35

The values of the attribute.
